trans-unit.source: ...[HealthTap's] ecosystem of the doctors and peer review are how [it creates] a transparency..., a rating system..., and a learning system, ...to create a place where people can manage their health from query-to-cure.

trans-unit.target: HealthTap将人工智能带入自我诊断

trans-unit.source: “Flex is all about helping the world live smarter, and we are dedicated to bringing intelligent solutions to how our employees access healthcare and manage their health and well-being. HealthTap offers a query-to-cure system that provides Flex employees a simple, immediate, and personalized way to tap in and access health services from a network of top doctors, helping to curb costs.”
trans-unit.target: “Flex是帮助生活变得更智能，我们致力于为我们的员工找到获得医疗保健和管理他们的健康和幸福的智能的解决方案。HealthTap提供了一个查询到治疗系统，可以为Flex员工提供一种简单，即时，专属的方式，轻触即可从顶级医生网络访问健康服务，从而帮助控制成本。”

trans-unit.source: “We are so thankful for HealthTap’s speed and efficiency. We needed to quickly provide thousands of our employees with accessible, easy-to-use information and virtual care, and that’s exactly what HealthTap delivered…through HealthTap's proprietary technology and deep domain expertise.…We are proud to partner with HealthTap and support their efforts to bring this much-needed service to population managers around the world.”
trans-unit.target: “我们非常感谢HealthTap的速度和效率。我们需要快速为成千上万的员工提供可访问的，易于使用的信息和在线医护，这正是HealthTap可以提供的...通过HealthTap的专有技术和深厚的领域专业知识...我们很自豪能与HealthTap合作并支持他们的努力为世界各地的人口管理者带来急需的服务。”

trans-unit.source: “We have thousands of employees in Chennai, and providing each with care and support during natural disasters is a top priority with Flex. Thanks to HealthTap, our employees were able to immediately access high-quality health and medical information.”
trans-unit.target: “我们在金奈有成千上万的员工，在自然灾害期间为每个人提供医护和支持是Flex的首要任务。感谢HealthTap，我们的员工能够立即获得高质量的健康和医疗信息。”

trans-unit.source: Our first responsibility is to do good for the individuals who use HealthTap, especially when making decisions that affect their health and the health of their loved ones. We care deeply about people and are committed to providing information and access to ...MORE › care that meet the highest standards of safety and validity, and help people take actions to Feel Good every day.
trans-unit.target: 我们的第一使命是为使用HealthTap 的个人服务，特别是在做出影响他们的健康和他们亲人健康的决策时。 我们深切关注每一个人，并致力于提供信息和访问 ...更多 › 满足最高安全性和有效性标准的医护，并帮助人们每天采取行动Feel Good。

trans-unit.source: We value and honor the trust of those who use HealthTap. We treat the personal information of individuals with the utmost care and maintain the highest standards of privacy and security.
trans-unit.target: 我们重视和尊重那些使用HealthTap的用户的信任。我们非常小心地处理个人的个人信息，并保持最高的隐私和安全标准。

trans-unit.source: We believe in collaboration and recognize that partnership is integral to realizing our vision. We are committed to being a great partner, and to attracting and retaining the world's best organizations and institutions as ...MORE › collaborators.
trans-unit.target: 我们相信合作，并认识到合作伙伴关系是实现我们的愿景的必要条件。我们致力于成为一个优秀的合作伙伴，并吸引和留住世界上最好的组织和机构，如 ...更多 › 合作伙伴。

trans-unit.source: This updated document eliminates redundancies, better explains the relationship between you and HealthTap, and updates outdated references Separate Terms apply to HealthTap Prime and HealthTap Concierge.
trans-unit.target: 此更新的文档消除了冗余部分，更好地解释了您与HealthTap之间的关系，并更新过时的适用于HealthTap Prime和HealthTap贵宾台的参考独立条款。

trans-unit.source: We strongly encourage everyone to read our new Terms of Use carefully, and in their entirety. Thank you for your support.
trans-unit.target: 我们强烈鼓励每个人全面仔细地阅读我们的新使用条款。感谢您的支持。

trans-unit.source: This Terms of Use (or "TOU") is an agreement between you and HealthTap, Inc. ("HealthTap"). There are rules you agree to follow when using our mobile applications and website(s) (the "Apps"), including when you ask questions and when you view or input content on or into the Apps.
trans-unit.target: 本使用条款（或“TOU”）是您与HealthTap，Inc.（“HealthTap”）之间的协议。 在使用我们的移动应用程序和网站（“应用程序”）时，您同意遵守的规则，包括当您提出问题时以及在应用程序中或在其中查看或输入内容时需遵守的规则。

trans-unit.source: Additional terms govern your use of HealthTap Prime and HealthTap Concierge.
trans-unit.target: 附加条款将对您使用 HealthTap Prime和HealthTap 贵宾台作出规定。

trans-unit.source: Generally, this agreement governs your use of the Apps. Other terms may apply to your use of a specific features or parts of our Apps.
trans-unit.target: 总的来说，本协议规定了您对应用程序（Apps）的使用。其他条款适用于有特定功能或部分的应用程序（Apps）。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap is designed to support the health decisions and choices that you make. These decisions and choices are yours, and we believe that you are the best decision maker about your health and that these decisions should be made in connection with the advice you receive within a formal doctor-patient relationship. Always use common sense when making health decisions. HealthTap cannot make decisions for you. We can help you find good health information and, where available and appropriate, connect with doctors for care via HealthTap Prime or HealthTap Concierge or for in-person care.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap旨在支持您做出的健康决定和选择。这些决定和选择是属于您的并且我们相信您是您健康的最佳决策者，并且这些决定应与您在正式医患关系中接受的建议相关。在做出健康决定时总是使用常识。HealthTap不能为您做出决定。但是我们可以帮助您找到良好的健康信息，并在可行和适当的情况下，通过HealthTap Prime或HealthTap贵宾台与医生联系以进行医护或面对面的医护。

trans-unit.source: On HealthTap Prime and Concierge you can obtain care (if you are located in a state where such service is available). This TOU applies to HealthTap. Additional terms apply to HealthTap Prime and HealthTap Concierge.
trans-unit.target: 在HealthTap Prime和贵宾台您可以获得医护（如果您所在州可以提供这样的服务）。本使用条款适用于HealthTap。附加条款适用于HealthTap Prime和HealthTap贵宾台。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap Prime and HealthTap Concierge support doctor-patient relationships. HealthTap Concierge may be used where an ongoing doctor-patient relationship exists, and a temporary doctor-patient relationship is created by the use of HealthTap Prime.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap Prime和HealthTap贵宾台支持医患关系。HealthTap贵宾台可用于已有持续的医患关系，并可以通过使用HealthTap Prime创建临时的医患关系。

trans-unit.source: Whenever we use the words "your physician" or "your doctor" or "healthcare provider" or similar words on HealthTap, including in these Terms of Use, we mean your personal doctor with whom you have of an actual, mutually acknowledged, doctor-patient relationship (or the same kind of formal, real-world relationship between you and your personal professional healthcare provider) within the United States. Medical Experts on HealthTap are not "your" doctor, physician, or healthcare provider. When you participate in a Virtual Consult on HealthTap Prime, you understand and agree that Medical Experts on HealthTap Prime are not your Primary Care Physician and you agree not to use HealthTap Prime as a substitute for interactions with your Primary Care Physician. Where available to you, you may use HealthTap Concierge for Virtual Consults with your existing doctor(s).
trans-unit.target: 无论何时我们在HealthTap上包括在这些使用条款上，使用“您的医师”或“您的医生”或“医疗保健提供者”或类似的词语时，我们都是指在美国境内与您有实质的、互相认可的、建立了医患关系（或正式的、现实生活中您和您的个人专业护理提供者之间的关系）的个人医生。当您在 HealthTap Prime上进行在线咨询时，您理解并同意HealthTap Prime 上的医学专家不是您的初级保健医生，您同意不使用HealthTap Prime 替代您与您的初级保健医生的交流。在允许的地方，您可以使用HealthTap贵宾台和在线诊疗与您既有的医生交流。

trans-unit.source: Interactions on HealthTap do not constitute the practice of medicine and consultations cannot be used for providing a formal medical diagnosis, for a physical examination, for obtaining prescriptions, or for treatment. Do not use HealthTap or Content or Services to diagnose or treat a medical condition. Use HealthTap Prime or Concierge (where appropriate and permitted) or see your doctor in person if you are looking for a personal medial evaluation, diagnosis, or prescription.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap的互动不构成医学的诊疗，咨询不能用于提供正式的医疗诊断，身体检查，获取处方或治疗。不要使用HealthTap或内容或服务来诊断或治疗医疗状况。如果您正在寻找个人医疗评估，诊断或处方，，请使用HealthTap Prime或贵宾台（在适当和允许的情况下）或者请与您的医生亲自见面。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap is a Business Associate of health care professionals under the federal health care privacy and security law known as HIPAA. Your personal information will be stored in a secure manner. HealthTap has implemented various encryption and security technologies and procedures to protect, from unauthorized access, your personal information which is stored in our computer systems. We also maintain standard physical and electronic procedural safeguards that limit access to your personal information to our employees (or people working on our behalf and under confidentiality agreements) who, through the course of standard business activities, need to access your personal information. Full access to the Apps is enabled only by usernames and passwords. You are fully and solely responsible for any and all use of the Apps using your username and password. We reserve the right to revoke or deactivate your username and password at any time.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap是受联邦医疗隐私和安全法(HIPAA)监管下医疗保健专业人员的业务伙伴。您的个人信息将以安全的方式存储。HealthTap已实施了各种加密和安全技术及程序，来保护储存于我们电脑系统内的个人信息，避免未经授权的访问。我们还实行标准的物理和电子程序保障措施，来限制我们的员工（或代表我们的人以及有保密协议的人）只能在进行标准的业务活动而需要访问您的个人信息时，才可以访问您的个人信息完全访问应用程序只有在使用用户名和密码时才有效。您使用您的用户名和密码，并完全和独自对任何和所有使用应用程序(Apps)的行为负责。我们保留在任何时间取消或停用您的用户名和密码的权利。

trans-unit.source: Your use of HealthTap and any Content and Services must comply with all applicable federal and state laws, regulations, and ordinances. Currently, you must be at least 16 years old to use HealthTap and at least 18 years old to register for HealthTap Premium Services.
trans-unit.target: 您使用HealthTap任何内容和服务必须遵守所有适用的联邦和州的法律，法规，条例。目前，您必须至少16岁才能使用HealthTap，年满18岁才能注册HealthTap的高级服务。

trans-unit.source: When you register, you agree that HealthTap may communicate with you, including by sending information, correspondence, and notices to you. These communications may be sent via email, SMS (text message), push notification, phone, or otherwise using contact information associated with your account, including information provided when you register or update information in your Account Settings. We have a No-Spam policy, and you can opt out of communications and control your communications preferences through your Account Settings. We do not sell or distribute the email addresses of our users.
trans-unit.target: 当您注册时，您同意HealthTap可能与您的沟通，包括向您发送信息，通讯和通知。这些通信可以通过电子邮件，短信（文本消息），推送通知，电话或其他方式使用与您的帐户相关联的联系信息发送，包括在您的帐户设置中注册或更新信息时提供的信息。我们制定了“垃圾邮件”政策，您可以通过“帐户设置”选择停止通讯并控制您的通讯偏好设置。我们绝不会出售或分发我们用户的电子邮件地址。

trans-unit.source: It's free to ask health questions and receive health answers and tips on HealthTap. HealthTap also provides premium, optional Services and Content that can be accessed for a fee. ("Premium Services" and "Premium Content", respectively). HealthTap Prime Concierge are paid services. We will never ask you for your credit card or other payment information unless you indicate that you would like to use a paid service.
trans-unit.target: 在HealthTap可以免费询问健康问题并收到健康的回答和小贴士。HealthTap还提供可以访问的付费的高级，可选服务和内容。 （分别为“高级服务”和“高级内容”）。HealthTap Prime和贵宾台是付费服务。我们绝不会要求您提供您的信用卡或其他付款信息，除非您表明您希望使用付费服务。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap is a service for individuals to use to support their personal health decisions. You may use HealthTap for personal, but not for commercial, purposes in accordance with all applicable federal, state and local laws. Organizations, companies, and businesses may not become registered members or use our Apps as entities or through individual members. Licensed U.S. doctors and other qualified medical experts may apply to participate on HealthTap for educational purposes as Medical Experts, or to provide virtual consults via HealthTap Prime and Concierge. The Content is licensed only for the personal, household, and educational use of a single individual. No commercial use or commercial redistribution of any Content is permitted. Any hyperlink or other re-display of the information on another website must display the Content full-screen and not within a "frame" on the linked or other site, unless expressly pre-approved and permitted by HealthTap in writing. By using HealthTap, you agree not to harvest, scrape or otherwise collect any information about our members or doctors for any reason, including but not limited to for sending unsolicited communications, including spam.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap是个人用来支持他们个人健康决定的服务。您可以根据所有适用的联邦，州和当地法律，将HealthTap用于个人服务，但是不用于商业目的。组织，公司和企业不得作为单位或通过个人会员成为注册会员或使用我们的应用程序。拥有美国执业执照的医生和其他合格的医疗专家可以为教育目的申请参加HealthTap作为医疗专家，或通过HealthTap Prime和贵宾台提供在线咨询。内容许可仅授予个人，家庭和教育使用的单独个人。不允许对任何内容进行商业使用或商业再分发。任何超链接或其他网站上的信息的其他重新显示必须全屏显示内容，而不是在链接或其他网站的“框架”内，除非HealthTap明确地预先批准和允许。通过使用HealthTap，您同意不以任何原因（包括但不限于发送未经请求的通信，包括垃圾邮件）获取，刮除或以其他方式收集有关我们的会员或医生的任何信息。

trans-unit.source: The platforms available via the Apps (the “HealthTap Platforms”) offer features and services available to you via your mobile phone or other mobile device. These features and services may include the ability to upload content to the HealthTap Platforms, receive messages from the HealthTap Platforms, download applications to your mobile phone or access HealthTap Platforms features (collectively, the "Mobile Features"). Standard messaging, data and other fees may be charged by your carrier. Your carrier may prohibit or restrict certain Mobile Features, and certain Mobile Features may be incompatible with your carrier or mobile device. Contact your carrier with questions regarding these issues. As applicable, instructions regarding how to opt-out of Mobile Features will be disclosed in connection with Mobile Features. The instructions will typically require you to text a keyword (such as "STOP," "CANCEL," "END," "UNSUBSCRIBE," "QUIT," etc.) to the applicable shortcode for the Mobile Feature, or to change your profile settings inside the Apps. You agree to notify HealthTap of any changes to your mobile number and update your account(s) on the HealthTap Platforms to reflect this change.
trans-unit.target: 通过应用程序（“HealthTap平台”）提供的平台通过您的手机或其他移动设备为您提供功能和服务。这些功能和服务可能包括将内容上传到HealthTap平台，从HealthTap平台接收消息，将应用程序下载到您的手机或访问HealthTap平台功能（统称为“移动功能”）。标准信息，数据和其他费用可能由您的运营商收取。您的运营商可能会禁止或限制某些移动功能，某些移动功能可能与您的运营商或移动设备不兼容。有关这些问题的问题，请与您的运营商联系。如果适用，将结合移动功能公开有关如何退出移动功能的说明。这些说明通常要求您将关键字（例如“停止”，“取消”，“结束”，“取消订购”，“退出”等）用文本表示为移动功能适用的短代码或更改您的个人资料设置。您同意向HealthTap通知您的手机号码的任何更改，并更新您的HealthTap平台帐户以反映此更改。

trans-unit.source: When you use action-oriented features on HealthTap and HealthTap Premium Services (including subscribing to a checklist or participating in a Virtual Consult), you agree that HealthTap and HealthTap Medical Group, P.C. may send you automatically via e-mail, mobile telephone or other contact information provided by you in your account settings, content including but not limited to, reminders relating to health checklists or doctor recommended actions for you. As a result, the content in those reminders may contain protected health information under HIPAA, including content related to conditions, treatments, and medications. You understand and agree that by using these features, you are opting into receiving your own protected health information by email, SMS or mobile telephone notification, which is not secure. You also understand and agree that by receiving such protected health information by e-mail, SMS or mobile telephone notification, you will be charged by your wireless or internet provider and that such e-mails, SMS or mobile telephone notification may be generated by an automated dialing system. You control the utility, and the privacy, of the reminders you receive. In your account settings, you can control what information is sent to you, and where it’s sent, and you can unsubscribe or opt-out from receiving reminders via email, SMS or mobile telephone notification , or any of them. If you prefer not to receive personal information by email or mobile notification, you agree to update your account notification settings.
trans-unit.target: 当您在HealthTap和HealthTap高级服务（包括订阅清单或参与在线咨询）中使用行为性功能时，您同意HealthTap和HealthTap Medical Group，P.C.可以通过您在帐户设置中提供的电子邮件、移动电话或其他联系信息自动发送给您，内容包括但不限于与健康清单或医生建议的行动有关的提醒。因此，这些提醒中的内容可能包含受HIPAA保护的健康信息，包括与症状、治疗和药物相关的内容。您理解并同意，通过使用这些功能，您选择通过电子邮件、短信或移动电话通知接收您自己的受保护的健康信息，这是不安全的。您还理解并同意，通过电子邮件、短信或移动电话通知接收此类受保护的健康信息，您将被您的无线或互联网提供商收取费用，并且此类电子邮件、短信或移动电话通知可能由自动拨号系统发出。您可以控制收到的提醒的实用程序和隐私权。在您的帐户设置中，您可以控制发送给您的信息以及发送到何处，并且您可以通过电子邮件、短信或移动电话通知取消订阅或选择退出接收提醒。如果您不希望通过电子邮件或移动通知接收个人信息，则表示您同意更新您的帐户通知设置。

trans-unit.source: If you violate any of these Terms of Use, your permission to use the Content and Services automatically terminates and you must immediately destroy any copies you have made of any portion of the Content.
trans-unit.target: 如果您违反任何这些使用条款，您使用内容和服务的权限自动终止，您必须立即销毁您对内容的任何部分所做的任何副本。

trans-unit.source: If you create, transmit, or display health and wellness or other information while using HealthTap, you agree to do so with information that you own or have the right to use.
trans-unit.target: 如果您在使用HealthTap时创建、传输或显示健康或其他信息，则表示您同意接受您拥有或有权使用的信息。

trans-unit.source: We request permission for the collection of precise location from your device per the permission system used by your mobile operating system. If you initially permit the collection of this information, you can later disable it by changing the location settings on your mobile device, however this will limit your ability to use certain features of our Services. If you permit our Apps to access location services, we may also collect your device location when the app is running in the foreground or background. Disabling our app’s collection of precise location from your device will not limit our ability to derive approximate location from your IP address. We use location information to help provide you with more relevant, personalized services. You may also change your location in the app settings.
trans-unit.target: 我们根据您的移动操作系统所使用的权限系统，向您的设备请求获取精确位置的权限。如果您最初允许收集此信息，以后可以通过更改移动设备上的位置设置来停用此功能，但这将限制您使用我们服务的某些功能的能力。如果您允许我们的应用程序访问位置，当应用程序在前台或后台运行时，我们还可能会收集您的设备位置。从您的设备中停用我们的应用程序收集精确位置信息不会限制我们从您的IP地址获取大致位置的能力。我们使用位置信息为您提供更相关的个性化服务。您也可以在应用程式设定中变更您的位置。

trans-unit.source: We make no representation that all products, Content or Services described on or available through the Apps (including HealthTap Prime and Concierge), are appropriate or available for use in locations outside the United States or all locations within the United States. Registered Users and Visitors access our Content and Services on their own initiative and are responsible for compliance with local laws. We make no claim that Content or Services are appropriate or may be downloaded outside of the United States.
trans-unit.target: 我们不认为所有产品，也就是本应用程序所描述或可行的内容或服务（包括HealthTap Prime和贵宾台），合适或能够在美国以外的地区或全美地区使用。注册用户和游客可主动访问我们的内容和服务，并有责任遵循当地法律。我们并不声称内容或服务是适当的，也不声称其可能在美国以外的地区下载。

trans-unit.source: If you are a non-U.S. member, you acknowledge and agree that HealthTap may collect and use your Information and disclose it to other entities outside your resident jurisdiction. In addition, such Information may be stored on servers located outside your resident jurisdiction. U.S. law may not provide the degree of protection for Information that is available in other countries.
trans-unit.target: 如果您是非美国会员，这意味着您承认并同意HealthTap收集使用您的信息并透露给居民管辖权地区以外其他实体的可能性。此外，这些信息可能会被存储在您居民管辖权以外地区的服务器上。美国法律可能不会提供在其他国家保护信息的程度。

trans-unit.source: If you do not consent to such transfer, you may not use our Content or Services. The product information provided on HealthTap is intended only for residents of the United States, and may have different product labeling and disclosure requirements in different countries.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不认同这种转移方式，您可以不使用我们的内容或服务。HealthTap提供的产品信息仅针对美国居民，而产品在不同国家可能有不同的标签和资料公开的要求。如果您不认同这种转移方式，您可以不使用我们的内容或服务。HealthTap提供的产品信息仅针对美国居民，而产品在不同国家可能有不同的标签和资料公开的要求。

trans-unit.source: You agree that member or expert submissions will apply with HealthTap's Submissions Terms and Policies.
trans-unit.target: 您同意会员或专家的提交将适用于HealthTap的提交条款和政策。

trans-unit.source: With the exception of any personal data or information you submit (which shall be maintained in accordance with our Privacy Policy) and other information governed by the Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act of 1996, Public Law 104-191 and the rules and regulations promulgated thereunder (as amended to date, "HIPAA"), if you make any submissions (by email or otherwise) on, to or through HealthTap, including but not limited to data, questions, comments, suggestions, business information, ideas, concepts or inventions, you make such submission without any restrictions or expectation of compensation or of confidentiality, and you agree that your submissions may be used without restriction for any purpose whatsoever, and you automatically grant-or warrant that the owner of such content or intellectual property has expressly granted-HealthTap the complete right to freely use such submissions in any way, commercial or otherwise, and for any purpose whatsoever, including the right to use, reproduce, modify, adapt, publish, transmit, translate, create derivative works from, publicly perform or display (in any media or form now known or hereafter developed), or otherwise communicate to the public, in the form of a royalty-free, perpetual, irrevocable, worldwide nonexclusive license. HealthTap may sublicense its rights. Such submissions will be treated as non-confidential and nonproprietary and will become the property of HealthTap, and HealthTap shall be free to use any ideas, concepts, know-how, or techniques contained in any communication you send to HealthTap for any purpose whatsoever, including, without limitation, developing and marketing products using such information.
trans-unit.target: 除了您提交的任何个人数据或信息（这应依照我们的隐私政策）和其他受1996年健康保险流通和责任法案，公法104-191和其颁布的相关规则及规例（修订到目前为止，“HIPPA”）管理的信息，如果您作出任何提交（通过电子邮件或其他方式）到或通过HealthTap，包括但不限于数据、问题、评论、建议、商业信息、理念、概念或发明，如果您的提交没有任何限制或对报酬和机密的期望，并且同意不限制您提交内容的使用目的，您自动批准或保证这些内容或知识产权所有者向HealthTap明确授予以任何方式自由使用这些提交内容的完整权利，不论是商业或是其他目的，包含使用、复制、修改、改编、出版、传播、翻译、创作衍生作品、公开演出或展示的权利（在任何媒体或以任何形式，无论是现在已知的或此后开发的），或以其他方式与公众沟通，以免版税、永久、不可撤销、全球非独家许可的形式。HealthTap有发布从属证书的权利。这样的提交将被视为非机密非专利，并将成为HealthTap的财产，HealthTap可以自由使用您以任何目的发送给HealthTap的任何想法、概念、技术或通信中包含的任何技术，包括但不限于，使用这些信息营销和开发产品。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap does not accept unsolicited recruiter or similar submissions and noes not pay fees for any such parties without a current contract on file, and you agree that any submissions of candidates by a recruiter or other third party without a valid and signed recruiting agreement in place with HealthTap prior to such submission will not be subject to any recruiter or similar fees.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap不接受不请自来的招聘人员或类似的提交，在没有当前合同文件的情况下不为任一方支付费用，您同意对于任何在提交前没有与HealthTap合法签署招聘协议的候选人或第三方的提交，HealthTap不承认并不支付费用。

trans-unit.source: Don't submit anything to us if you don't want to give us rights to it. If you wish to keep any business information, ideas, concepts or inventions private or proprietary, do not submit them on, through, or to HealthTap, by email or otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不想授予我们权利，请不要向我们提交任何东西。如果您想保留任何商业信息、想法、概念或的私有或专有发明，不要提交到或通过HealthTap提交，无论是通过电子邮件还是其他方式。

trans-unit.source: Medical Experts on the Apps include respected doctors throughout the United States. Only U.S.-licensed doctors may participate as Medical Experts on HealthTap (including HealthTap Prime and Concierge). Doctors whose licenses are or become suspended or revoked, for any reason, are not permitted and agree not to participate in any way, including but not limited to submitting Content to HealthTap as a Medical Expert on HealthTap or participating on HealthTap Prime or HealthTap Concierge. Supplemental Terms of Use apply to Experts who participate on HealthTap (including those who provide Premium Services).
trans-unit.target: 应用程序的医学专家包括在美国各地的受尊敬的医生。只有美国授权的医生可以作为HealthTap的医学专家参加（包括HealthTap Prime和贵宾台）。因任何原因许可被暂停或撤销的医生，不被允许并且同意不以任何方式参与，包括但不限于作为HealthTap的医学专家在HealthTap上提交内容或参与HealthTap Prime或HealthTap贵宾台。补充使用条款适用于参与HealthTap的专家（包括提供高级服务的专家）。

trans-unit.source: The Apps and the Content are provided on as "as is" basis. NEITHER WE, HEALTHTAP MEDICAL EXPERTS, NOR ANY OF OUR LICENSORS MAY BE HELD LIABLE UNDER THIS AGREEMENT FOR ANY DAMAGES OTHER THAN DIRECT DAMAGES, EVEN IF THE PARTY KNOWS OR SHOULD KNOW THAT OTHER DAMAGES ARE POSSIBLE, OR THAT DIRECT DAMAGES ARE NOT A SATISFACTORY REMEDY. THE LIMITATIONS IN THIS SECTION APPLY TO YOU ONLY TO THE EXTENT THEY ARE LAWFUL IN YOUR JURISDICTION. WE DISCLAIM ALL WARRANTIES EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, STATUTORY OR OTHERWISE, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO THE IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY, NON-INFRINGEMENT OF THIRD PARTIES' RIGHTS, AND FITNESS FOR PARTICULAR PURPOSE. Specifically, and without limiting the foregoing, We, our licensors, and our suppliers, make no representations or warranties about: (i) the accuracy, reliability, completeness, currentness, or timeliness of the Content provided on or through the use of HealthTap, whether by HealthTap or any other party; or (ii) the satisfaction of any government regulations requiring disclosure of information on prescription drug products or the approval or compliance of any software tools with HealthTap. Any location data accessed via the Apps may be inaccurate or incomplete and any use of such data is at your own risk.

trans-unit.source: How HealthTap protects your privacy when using our free service as well as HealthTap Premium Services (including Prime and Concierge).
trans-unit.target: 当您在使用我们的免费服务和HealthTap时，我们是如何保护您的隐私的（包括Prime和贵宾台）。

trans-unit.source: Yes. HealthTap and HealthTap Premium Services use bank-level security and encryption. We meet HIPAA security standards for all interactions subject to HIPAA security regulations. We use a variety of technologies and procedures to help protect the security of your personal information from unauthorized access, use, or disclosure. HealthTap also maintains standard physical and electronic procedural safeguards that limit access to your personal information to our employees (or people working on our behalf and under confidentiality agreements) who, through the course of standard business activities, need to access your personal information. HealthTap is a Business Associate of health care professionals under the federal health care privacy and security law known as HIPAA. Your personal information will be stored in a secure manner. Full access to the Apps is enabled only by usernames and passwords. You are fully and solely responsible for any and all use of the Apps using your username and password. We reserve the right to revoke or deactivate your username and password at any time.
trans-unit.target: 是的。HealthTap和HealthTap贵宾台使用银行级安全和加密。我们满足HIPAA安全标准，适用于符合HIPAA安全规定的所有互动。我们使用各种技术和程序来帮助保护您的个人信息的安全，防止未经授权的访问，使用或公开。HealthTap还维护标准的物理和电子程序保护，限制我们的员工访问您的个人信息（或代表我们和保密协议的人员），他们通过标准的业务活动，需要访问您的个人信息。 HealthTap是根据联邦医疗保健隐私和安全法被称为HIPAA的医疗保健专业人员的业务伙伴。您的个人信息将以安全的方式存储。只有用户名和密码才能启用对应用程序的完全访问权限。您使用您的用户名和密码对应用程序的任何和所有使用负全部和单独责任。我们保留随时撤销或停用您的用户名和密码的权利。

trans-unit.source: Your account and Profile information are secure, encrypted, and password protected.
trans-unit.target: 您的账户和个人简述信息是安全的被加密和密码保护的。

trans-unit.source: We keep your Personally Identifiable Information private by not displaying it or sharing it without your consent.
trans-unit.target: 我们不会在没有您的同意的情况下显示或分享您的个人身份信息，以此来保证这些信息的安全。

trans-unit.source: We do not display this information on HealthTap, except inside of your Profile, which is visible only to you. We keep this information secure by using state of the art encryption and other security measures.
trans-unit.target: 除在您的个人资料之中，我们不会在HealthTap上显示此信息，只有您可以看到此信息。我们通过使用最先进的加密和其他安全措施保持这些信息的安全。

trans-unit.source: On HealthTap Premium Services (including Prime an Concierge) you may ask specific, personal health questions and receive care and prescriptions (as appropriate for Virtual Consults).
trans-unit.target: 在HealthTap高级服务（包括贵宾台服务），您可以询问具体的个人健康问题，并获得医护和处方（适用于在线咨询）。

trans-unit.source: Posting Personally Identifiable Information (such as a real name, phone number, or email address) is not permitted in content that is publicly visible on HealthTap (including in user submitted free questions). Posting such information, about yourself or another person, is a violation of our Terms of Use. Do not include Personally Identifiable Information about you or anyone else in these questions or any other submissions that are publicly visible. HealthTap reserves the right to remove or exclude such content. Personal information may be shared with doctors during Virtual Consults on HealthTap Prime and Concierge.
trans-unit.target: 在HealthTap上公开显示的内容（包括用户提交的免费问题）中，不允许发布个人身份信息（例如真实姓名，电话号码或电子邮件地址）。发布此类信息，关于您自己或他人的信息，是违反我们的使用条款。不要在这些问题或公开显示的任何其他提交中包含关于您或任何其他人的个人身份信息。HealthTap保留删除或排除此类内容的权利。个人信息可以在HealthTap Prime和贵宾台上的在线咨询期间与医生共享。

trans-unit.source: Yes. Your email address and phone number are not displayed and are never visible to other members or doctors.
trans-unit.target: 是的。您的电子邮件地址和电话号码不会显示并且永远不会可见于其他会员或医生。

trans-unit.source: To receive the full benefits of HealthTap simply create an account. During registration, we ask for some basic information, such as your name, email address, and date of birth. No additional data other than mandatory registration information is required to use HealthTap. Additional information, including payment information, is required to use HealthTap Premium Services.
trans-unit.target: 只需创建一个帐户，即可享受HealthTap的全部福利。在注册过程中，我们会要求您提供一些基本信息，例如您的姓名，电子邮件地址和出生日期。使用HealthTap不需要强制注册信息之外的其他数据。使用HealthTap高级服务需要其他信息（包括付款信息）。

trans-unit.source: Health conditions and appropriate actions often depend on your age group, geography, and gender. These data help us provide you with a personalized online health experience. Your personally identifiable information is not visible to other members or doctors on HealthTap. These data are visible to doctors you connect with using HealthTap Premium Services (including Prime and Concierge).
trans-unit.target: 健康状况和合适的行动通常取决于您的年龄群组，地理位置和性别。这些数据帮助我们为您提供专属的在线健康体验。您的个人身份信息在HealthTap上不会显示给其他会员或医生。这些数据对使用HealthTap高级服务（包括Prime和贵宾台）连接的医生可见。

trans-unit.source: The Consult Summaries of your consults become part of your Profile. When you initiate Virtual Consults on HealthTap, the doctor seeing you will be able to view all of the Consult Summaries of your prior consults on HealthTap.
trans-unit.target: 咨询的咨询总结成为您的资料的一部分。当您在HealthTap上开始在线咨询时，为您诊疗的医生将能够查看您之前在HealthTap上的咨询的所有咨询总结。

trans-unit.source: Questions, answers, and interactions with doctors on HealthTap Prime and Concierge are private, secure, and are not publicly visible. Please note: the doctor(s) you interact with using HealthTap Premium Services will be able to see your real name and the health information in your Profile.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap Prime和贵宾台上的医生的问题，回答和互动是私人的，安全的，不公开可见的。请注意：使用HealthTap高级服务进行互动的医生将能够在您的个人资料中看到您的真实姓名和健康信息。

trans-unit.source: Yes. Unlike publicly visible questions and answers on HealthTap, you may provide Personally Identifiable Information in your interactions with doctors on HealthTap Prime and Concierge. HealthTap Prime and Concierge interactions are not publicly visible. These interactions are confidential, but not anonymous.
trans-unit.target: 是的。与HealthTap上公开可见的问题和回答不同，您可以在与HealthTap Prime和贵宾台上的医生的互动中提供个人身份信息。HealthTap Prime和贵宾台互动不公开显示。这些互动是保密的，但不是匿名的。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap does not share your Personally Identifiable Information (for example, your real name or email address) with anyone without your consent. By using HealthTap Premium Services (including Prime and Concierge), you consent to sharing your name and the health information in your Profile with the doctors you interact with when using these services.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap不会与未经您同意的任何人分享您的个人身份信息（例如，您的真实姓名或电子邮件地址）。通过使用HealthTap高级服务（包括Prime和贵宾台），您同意在使用这些服务时与您互动的医生分享您的个人资料中的姓名和健康信息。

trans-unit.source: You may reach us by contacting our support team via email or you may write to us at our most current address.
trans-unit.target: 您可以通过电子邮件联系我们的支持团队，或者通过我们最新的地址写信给我们。

trans-unit.source: Our company culture respects the values of secure sharing.
trans-unit.target: 我们的公司文化尊重安全分享的价值观。

trans-unit.source: We even provided additional suggestions for sharing securely and safeguarding your privacy when participating on HealthTap.
trans-unit.target: 我们甚至提供了额外的建议，当您参与时，在HealthTap上安全地分享和保护您的隐私。

trans-unit.source: On HealthTap Prime and Concierge, you can connect with a doctor by video, directly from your computer, tablet, or smartphone. You can ask personal health questions directly to a doctor, and receive care and prescriptions as appropriate for virtual consults. While interactions on HealthTap Prime and HealthTap Concierge are not anonymous (your name and health information are shared with the doctors you consult with), they are secure and confidential.
trans-unit.target: 在HealthTap Prime和贵宾台上，您可以直接从计算机，平板电脑或智能手机上通过视频与医生联系。您可以直接向医生询问个人健康问题，并通过在线咨询获得合适的医护和处方。虽然HealthTap Prime和HealthTap贵宾台上的互动不是匿名的（您的姓名和健康信息与您咨询的医生分享），但它们是安全和保密的。

trans-unit.source: We take your privacy and security very seriously.
trans-unit.target: 我们非常重视您的隐私和安全。
